revised_title: Observations on the Effects and Uses of Vitrum Antimonii Ceratum
tldr: The author discusses the preparation, effects, and uses of Vitrum Antimonii Ceratum, a medicine made from antimony glass, for treating various ailments such as bloody-fluxes, diarrhea, quartan agues, and fluor albus. The medicine is also found to be effective in treating pregnant women and children, when used with caution. The author provides detailed instructions on how to use the medicine, including dosage, frequency, and potential side effects.
